original: Ekström, Bengt Arvid Reinhold, rådman, Halmstad, f. 20/9/87 i Halmstad av tullförvalt. Alf Emil E. o. Charlotta Godehmius. G. 1. 16 m. Kerstin Åberg, d. 43; 2. 44 m. Martha Jönsson. Barn: Inga-Britt (adopt:-dtr) f. 23. — Studiex. i Halmstad 06, jur. kand. i Upps. 10. E. o. not. i Svea hovr. 10, anst. å adv :byrå i Sthilm 10-12, e. o. not. i GÖta hovr. 13, tingstjg. 14-16, e. stadsnot. i Norrköp. 16, v. rådhusr. i Halmstad 16, tf. stadsnot. där 17, ord. 18, tillika mag:-sekr. o. not. publ., brottmåls- o. mag:-rådm. 38, civ:rådm. 41, inskrivn :rådm. 46. Auditör 42, v. krigsdom. 42. Ordf. i arb :lösh :komm. 32-37, v. ordf. i byggnrndn 41-43. RVO.
translated: Ekström, Bengt Arvid Reinhold, magistrate, Halmstad, b. 20/9/87 in Halmstad to customs official Alf Emil E. and Charlotta Godehmius. Married 1st on 16th month with Kerstin Åberg, d. 43; 2nd on 44th month with Martha Jönsson. Children: Inga-Britt (adopted daughter) b. 23. Studied in Halmstad in 1906 and graduated with a law degree from Uppsala University in 1910. Worked as a deputy notary in Svea Court of Appeal in 1910 and was employed in a law firm in Stockholm from 1910-1912. Became a deputy notary in Gota Court of Appeal in 1913 and served as a judicial trainee from 1914-1916. Appointed as a permanent notary in Norrkoping in 1916, became a deputy magistrate in Halmstad in 1917, and was appointed as an ordinary magistrate in 1918, serving at the same time as a secretary and public notary. Served as a magistrate and criminal court judge in 1938, became a civilian magistrate in 1941, and was registered as a magistrate in 1946. Served as an auditor in 1942 and as a vice military judge in 1942. Also served as chairman of the unemployment committee from 1932-1937 and vice-chairman of the building committee from 1941-1943. Awarded RVO (Order of Vasa).

award.name: Order of Vasa
award.description: Royal Order of Vasa, Knight First Class
